question: /api/jokes
answer: Returns a list of Christmas-themed jokes
title: Optional Parameters

parameters.name: random
parameters.description: Returns a random joke from the list of jokes

question: /api/facts
answer: Returns a list of Christmas-themed facts
title: Optional Parameters

parameters.name: random
parameters.description: Returns a random fact from the list of facts

question: /api/images
answer: Returns a list of Christmas-themed images. Default is five 900x700 images.
title: Optional Parameters

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Returns the specified amount of images. Max is 10.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Returns images from the specified category.

question: /api/songs
answer: Returns a list of Christmas-themed songs
title: Optional Parameters

parameters.name: random
parameters.description: Returns a random song from the list of songs

question: /api/greetings
answer: Returns a list of Christmas-themed greetings
title: Optional Parameters

parameters.name: random
parameters.description: Returns a random greeting from the list of greetings

question: /api/cookie
answer: Returns the type of cookie Santa would like for you to leave him this year

question: /api/countdown
answer: Returns the number of months, weeks, sleeps, days, hours, minutes, and seconds until Christmas. Also, what day of the week Christmas falls on this year.
